name: Event-driven systems & architecture with Chris Richardson, Indu Alagarsamy & Viktor Stanchev (Go Time #297)
summary: Event-driven systems may not be the go-to solution for everyone because of the challenges they can add. While the system reacting to events published in other parts of the system seem elegant, some of the complexities they bring can be challenging.
